00038 #ifndef PMEMOBJ_SHARED_MUTEX_HPP
00039 #define PMEMOBJ_SHARED_MUTEX_HPP
00040 
00041 #include "libpmemobj/thread.h"
00042 #include "libpmemobj/tx_base.h"
00043 
00044 namespace nvml
00045 {
00046 
00047 namespace obj
00048 {
00049 
00059 class shared_mutex {
00060 public:
00062         typedef PMEMrwlock *native_handle_type;
00063 
00067         shared_mutex() noexcept = default;
00068 
00072         ~shared_mutex() = default;
00073 
00086         void
00087         lock()
00088         {
00089                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00090                 if (int ret = pmemobj_rwlock_wrlock(pop, &this->plock))
00091                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00092                                          "Failed to lock a "
00093                                          "shared mutex.");
00094         }
00095 
00111         void
00112         lock_shared()
00113         {
00114                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00115                 if (int ret = pmemobj_rwlock_rdlock(pop, &this->plock))
00116                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00117                                          "Failed to shared lock a "
00118                                          "shared mutex.");
00119         }
00120 
00135         bool
00136         try_lock()
00137         {
00138                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00139                 int ret = pmemobj_rwlock_trywrlock(pop, &this->plock);
00140 
00141                 if (ret == 0)
00142                         return true;
00143                 else if (ret == EBUSY)
00144                         return false;
00145                 else
00146                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00147                                          "Failed to lock a"
00148                                          " shared mutex.");
00149         }
00150 
00167         bool
00168         try_lock_shared()
00169         {
00170                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00171                 int ret = pmemobj_rwlock_tryrdlock(pop, &this->plock);
00172 
00173                 if (ret == 0)
00174                         return true;
00175                 else if (ret == EBUSY)
00176                         return false;
00177                 else
00178                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00179                                          "Failed to lock a"
00180                                          " shared mutex.");
00181         }
00182 
00193         void
00194         unlock()
00195         {
00196                 PMEMobjpool *pop = pmemobj_pool_by_ptr(this);
00197                 if (int ret = pmemobj_rwlock_unlock(pop, &this->plock))
00198                         throw lock_error(ret, std::system_category(),
00199                                          "Failed to unlock a"
00200                                          " shared mutex.");
00201         }
00202 
00213         void
00214         unlock_shared()
00215         {
00216                 this->unlock();
00217         }
00218 
00224         native_handle_type
00225         native_handle() noexcept
00226         {
00227                 return &this->plock;
00228         }
00229 
00235         enum pobj_tx_lock
00236         lock_type() const noexcept
00237         {
00238                 return TX_LOCK_RWLOCK;
00239         }
00240 
00244         shared_mutex &operator=(const shared_mutex &) = delete;
00245 
00249         shared_mutex(const shared_mutex &) = delete;
00250 
00251 private:
00253         PMEMrwlock plock;
00254 };
00255 
00256 } /* namespace obj */
00257 
00258 } /* namespace nvml */

00260 #endif /* PMEMOBJ_SHARED_MUTEX_HPP */
